reviews.review:
An epic and jaw dropping movie. 
Marvels has nailed it as always ???? 
Thor rellay stood up all the chris's were awesome ?? 
RDJ as always proved he's the best at what he do???? love u tony ??????. 

The film is must watch and.. Will be a rollercoster ride for the die hard marvels fans like myself ??????????

Absolutely amazing, definitely a must-see not once not twice but as much as possible. This is yet another piece of evidence that Marvel have mastered the art of comic book movie. Walking into this, I had a bit of concern  on how the Russos would handle 60 + characters with distinct backstories, but they handled it exeptionally well and surpassed all standards. I pray that you all get to see this 'marvel' of a movie.
It was more of a horror movie. I hope the second one is more like a superhero movie so I can give it 5 stars!!
Is this a Marvel movie or a Shakespeare tragedy? I blame Disney.

Avengers Infinity War is a mind blowing adventure film with everyone's favorite superheroes fighting it out with Thanos! It gets weird at the end! An edge of your seat escape into one of the greatest Marvel films ever! Great way to start the year off!

Literally the best movie you've ever seen. Nothing you expect, all theories made did not come true. This will make you cry, laugh, and kept in wondering for a year. But the directors have also lied a lot about the movie, which kinda gave a bit of false hope. The ending is not one marvel usually makes.
Buenisima esta mierda, la mejor pelicula del año hp!!!

What Marvel Studios pulled off is something beyond excellence. Numerous Characters in one movie and it delivered perfectly. Aside from a little pacing issues, which is bound to happen because of the huge cast, this movie is extremely good. Every Character got their moments to shine and Thanos is hands down the most complex villain, in an outstanding way. The Action sequences are JAW DROPPING. And the comic timings were seamless as well. This movie had to have some comical moments because it's pretty dark this time around. Worth every penny. Glad I went for the First day first show experience. A huge round of applause for the entire Marvel Studios.

Didn’t fulfilled the high expectations. Rushed, downgraded main characters and juggled between too many of them and subplots. It’s still an achievement by its scale, but incoherent by tone and editing which are overlooked by fans.
